Text: The Muppet Christmas Carol is a 1992 American-British musical fantasy comedy-drama film and an adaptation of Charles Dickens's 1843 novel "A Christmas Carol".
Triplets:<The Muppet Christmas Carol
2:
--------------------
Text: The Muppet Christmas Carol:  Although it is a comedic film with contemporary songs, "The Muppet Christmas Carol" otherwise follows Dickens's original story closely.
Triplets:<The Muppet Christmas Carol
3:
--------------------
Text: The Muppet Christmas Carol:  The film was produced and directed by Brian Henson for Jim Henson Productions and released by Walt Disney Pictures.
